reporter-output.line: Test Scenario 11: Validate Payment Method[Credit Card, Paypal & Open Account]
Time and Date of Test Execution2018-10-22 17:38:39
To Verify that Home Page is Displayed
Welcome Msg is Displayed ====>: WELCOME TO OUR NEW SITE
===>Home page is opened and Logo is Matched</br>
Verify that without filling details and click on Create New Account a Error Message Appeared
Without Entering Details and Click on Create New Account Button===>This is a required field.
===>User Cannot Create a Account without entering a Details</br>
Step :7 Enter the Details under Create New Account and click on create new Account
Click on Sign Up For Newsletter Check Box
Type the same password under confirm password ===>baps@200
After filling all the details click on Create A Account
Show the Confirmation Message after Formed is Filled
Confirmation Message is Displayed===>Thank you for registering with ProMed Xpress Products.
===>User Home Page is Appeared with the Welcome Message</br>
Step :10 Mouse Over to Mobility in Home Page
Step :12 Click on Add to Cart Button
Verify that the Product which has been Selected is showing under My Cart Option
Item Selected in the Page Matches Item in the Cart : Double Sided Security Bed Rails 18"X20"
Converting String to Int of Original Price : 132.28
Item Selected in the Page : Double Sided Security Bed Rails 18"X20"
Converting String to Int of Original Price : 132.28
Item Selected and Item in My Cart Matches
Item Selected and Item in My Cart Price Matches
===>Product and Price Verified in My Cart</br>
Step :14 Click on CheckOut Option under My Cart
Filling the Shipping Information of the Customer
Step :15 Type the Shipping Address where the Customer want to Send his Order
Enter Email Id of Customer====>: prashantp+9333820@accorin.com</br>
Enter Email Id of Customer====>: baps@200</br>
Click on Login Button After entering email id and password</br>
Enter Street Address====>: 360 Vetarans Parkway, Suite 115</br>
Select the State from the Drop Down :==> Illinois </br>
Enter the Pin Code of the State: 60440</br>
Select the Country from the Drop Down :==> United States </br>
Enter the Phone Number of Customer: 123456789</br>
Click on Address Validation Pop Up Window</br>
Click on Ground Standard under Choose a Shipping Option</br></br>
After Filling all the detail Click on Next Button</br></br>
Select the PayPal Payment Mode and Enter Valid Credentials
Click on Pay Pal Radio Button</br>
Click on continue to paypal option</br>
Enter the Valid Paypal email id===> 31julymm@mailinator.com</br>
After entering Valid Email ID and Password Click on Login Button
===>Item is Placed and Payment is made through PayPal</br>
Verify that Order has been Confirmed and A message has been Displayed
Confirmation Message is Displayed :YOUR ORDER HAS BEEN PLACED
Email Confirmation has Been Sent :An email confirmation is on its way to prashantp+9333820@accorin.com
===>Item is Placed and Shown in the Place</br>
To Verify that Home Page is Displayed
Welcome Msg is Displayed ====>: WELCOME TO OUR NEW SITE
===>Home page is opened and Logo is Matched</br>
Step :24 Click on Login button under I user Icon
User should be redirected to Login Page and asked for Username and Password
Step :25 User will be redirected to customer Login page
Step :26 Click on Pro Med Express Logo
Step :27 Mouse Over to Mobility in Home Page
Step :29 Click on Add to Cart Button
===============>User should see the Product Under My Cart
Step :31 Click on CheckOut Option under My Cart
===============>User should be Redirected to Shipping Address Page
